title: Remove branch management links to simplify Development Task interface
description: Eliminate Branch, PR created and ready for development, and Rebase links from the Development Task UI to reduce interface complexity and create a clean, focused user experience that prioritizes core task management functionality
iWant: to remove Branch, PR created, and Rebase links from the Development Task interface
soThat: I can have a simple and clean task management interface without unnecessary branch operation clutter
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is completely removed from Development Task UI
PR created and ready for development link is eliminated
Rebase link is removed from the interface
Core Development Task functionality remains intact and accessible
